ygData.subject: RE: More on the Plane of Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: It s guarded by a lot more than just 2 spectres and I believe that spectres are closer to level 40.  It also has a necro or something standing at the gate
ygData.messageBody:
It's guarded by a lot more than just 2 spectres and I believe that spectres
are closer to level 40. It also has a necro or something standing at the
gate protecting it. I think that there are already PLENTY of precautions to
keep low level players out. I don't know how in the hell that the level 1
ogres got in there. I tried it just so I could see the planes, and I had SOW
on a level one Ogre and got toasted by the spectres when I was barely inside
the cave.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro

> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> I am not flaming you, Azor. I know that you are just the deliverer of the
> information that was posted.
> But we are talking about another plane of existence. There should be some
> serious side-effects for trying to enter a place of this magnitude. From
> what I hear, this place has some of the rarest items in the game, and
> god-like creatures roam the land freely. Setting foot in this place should
> come with some consequence, much less getting close to it. I
> agree with the
> gate idea. Also, I thought the passageway to the gate was guarded by 2 35+
> level spectres? (could be wrong on that)
> I've never been near this place, but I don't think it would be
> too fun if I
> could just stroll right in a grab that Cleric-only armor I've been hearing
> about.
>
> Drizben D'vorn
> High Priest of Innoruuk
